tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
********* ******.  Visited clinic for slightly complicated issues with my tooth.  
Dr Marilyn was patient enough to listen to all the issues, suggested best possible remedies and explained the treatment in detail. 
Doctor is friendly, caring and very much dedicated to work. I could reach doctor even on Sunday and the dedication that was shown was highly admirable..   
I am going through the treatment at present and hope to get well soon.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind feedback!

review: Dr Marilyn patiently listens and recommends treatments. She doesn't force it on us. I assumed the something bad would happen and expected my tooth to be removed or a root canal, only to be recommended a cleaning session. Even thru the cleaning session, she was updating what she was doing and what to expect. Very reasonable rates and a very good experience. Definitely recommend her for any dental treatment.
